About us

More than just IT

Where it all began

I grew up in Dagestan, in the city of Khasavyurt. These values shaped my worldview and became the foundation of my projects. For the last 12 years Türkiye has been my second home, where ideas turn into global products.

A technical path that led to leadership

ears of experience as a system engineer, programmer and Big Data specialist gave me the tools to build, not just dream. Today, as a founder and CEO, I create an ecosystem of products transforming the digital life of the global Muslim community.

A mission larger than a product

In a world full of noise and censorship, I build platforms based on truth and freedom of speech. My mission is to empower the Ummah with tools for connection, education and unity. I personally invested in Umma Life from day one because I believe in it with all my heart.

The Development and Future of UMMA LIFE

Ecosystem of UMMA Life

Faq

Umma Life is a global social network for Muslims, built around truth, freedom of speech and community connection. It focuses on communication, learning and growth within the Ummah.

The Umma ecosystem is a comprehensive set of platforms and projects designed to integrate finance, technology, and community. While the core focus is often on Umma Network, the ecosystem is expanding to include several key projects that build upon its decentralized foundation

Dubai, UAE (a major hub for Islamic finance and crypto adoption).

European or Asian technological centers.

Virtual Presence: Crucially, the Umma ecosystem itself is a decentralized project. This means its core Umma Network infrastructure does not have a single physical headquarters. The project operates globally, driven by its community and smart contract

Yes, the principal individuals and founders behind the Umma ecosystem, including Isa Dagestani, are strongly committed to the long-term success of the projects and are known to be significant investors in them. Why Founder Investment Matters (Proof of Confidence): Strong Commitment (Skin in the Game): When founders personally invest, it signals deep confidence in the project's longevity and viability. This is a crucial factor for attracting other institutional investors and building community trust in the Umma ecosystem.

Alignment with Community: By investing their own resources and Umma tokens, the founders' financial interests are directly aligned with the interests of the entire community and all token holders. Their success is tied to the platform's success.

Long-Term Vision: Personal investment supports the project roadmap and helps ensure that strategic decisions are made with a focus on long-term growth and stability, rather than short-term gains.

In the decentralized finance (DeFi) world, the personal involvement and investment of the leadership are vital trust signals that help validate the project's integrity and future potential.

For partnership inquiries, collaboration opportunities, or direct communication with the principal figures behind the Umma ecosystem, including Isa Dagestani, it is highly recommended to use the official communication channels established by the project.

This ensures that your proposal is professionally reviewed by the appropriate team and documented through the correct channels. Recommended Contact Methods: Official Partnership Form: The most effective way is typically through the dedicated Partnership or Collaboration Form available on the main Umma website. This ensures all necessary details about your proposal are gathered upfront.

Business Development Email: Use the official email address designated for business inquiries and partnerships (e.g., partnerships@ummanetwork.io or bd@umma.finance). This is often monitored by the Business Development team.

Official Social Channels: For general contact, you can reach out via official platforms like LinkedIn or Twitter (X), ensuring you message the official verified account of the Umma project or the founder (if publicly listed).

Important Note: For security and verification purposes, avoid using unofficial personal emails or direct messages to unverified accounts. Always rely on the contact information explicitly provided on the official Umma ecosystem website or documentation.
